updates.message:
We have run into an issue with our H-1 hypervisor, a "ghost VM" is running a VM that shouldn't be and is uncontrollable from our VirtFusion. As a result, we are having to reboot this node to bring it back into proper service.

We believe this is the result of changing the specs of a VM while rebuilding it, This issue will be reported to VirtFusion
updates.messageHtml:
We have run into an issue with our H-1 hypervisor, a "ghost VM" is running a VM that shouldn't be and is uncontrollable from our VirtFusion. As a result, we are having to reboot this node to bring it back into proper service.

We believe this is the result of changing the specs of a VM while rebuilding it, This issue will be reported to VirtFusion

updates.message: H-1 is now back online, We are monitoring the VM in question for this issue.
updates.messageHtml: H-1 is now back online, We are monitoring the VM in question for this issue.

updates.message: Another Reboot is required of H-1, we will be rebooting this at 4:20 AM (in 10min from now)
updates.messageHtml: Another Reboot is required of H-1, we will be rebooting this at 4:20 AM (in 10min from now)

updates.message: This incident has been resolved.
updates.messageHtml: This incident has been resolved.

updates.message:
We are currently investigating issues with H-2\. Some of the VM's are not responding correctly. We will update shortly with updates on the matter.  
  
We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
updates.messageHtml:
We are currently investigating issues with H-2. Some of the VM's are not responding correctly. We will update shortly with updates on the matter.

We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.

updates.message:
We have investigated and have identified that VNC is causing the outage. We have currently disabled VNC and will investigate the cause.  
  
We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
updates.messageHtml:
We have investigated and have identified that VNC is causing the outage. We have currently disabled VNC and will investigate the cause.

We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.

updates.message:
We are still encountering issues with VNC, we are going to restart the hypervisor as there are some updates queued for a restart. We hopefully will fix the issue by this but will keep you all updated in due course.  
  
We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
updates.messageHtml:
We are still encountering issues with VNC, we are going to restart the hypervisor as there are some updates queued for a restart. We hopefully will fix the issue by this but will keep you all updated in due course.

We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.

name: Issues with accessing VPS panel from Firefox

updates.message:
We are currently investigating issues with our VPS panel and accessing from Firefox and Gecko derived browsers.  
  
During this time the VPS panel will be put into maintenance mode while we investigate.
updates.messageHtml:
We are currently investigating issues with our VPS panel and accessing from Firefox and Gecko derived browsers.

During this time the VPS panel will be put into maintenance mode while we investigate.

updates.message:
We have identified the issue with the SSL cert and have applied a fix we are now monitoring for any further issues.  
  
We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
updates.messageHtml:
We have identified the issue with the SSL cert and have applied a fix we are now monitoring for any further issues.

We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.

updates.message: We have seen no further issues with this and are now marking this as resolved.
updates.messageHtml: We have seen no further issues with this and are now marking this as resolved.

name: Email not being sent from hyberhost.com

updates.message: We are currently investigating why our emails are not being sent out.
updates.messageHtml: We are currently investigating why our emails are not being sent out.

updates.message: We have identified the issue is with Microsoft/Office365 and have raised a ticket with them to help resolve & fix this issue.
updates.messageHtml: We have identified the issue is with Microsoft/Office365 and have raised a ticket with them to help resolve & fix this issue.

updates.message: Microsoft/Office365 is now looking into this and running some backend diagnostics.
updates.messageHtml: Microsoft/Office365 is now looking into this and running some backend diagnostics.

updates.message: We are now starting to see Email being successfully sent again and are currently monitoring this.
updates.messageHtml: We are now starting to see Email being successfully sent again and are currently monitoring this.

updates.message: Microsoft/Office365 has informed us that this is now been resolved on their end.
updates.messageHtml: Microsoft/Office365 has informed us that this is now been resolved on their end.

name: Upstream Network Incident - High Latency & Packet Loss

updates.message:
We have been informed out a wavelength issue between Equinix MA1 (Manchester) and Continuity House (Coventry) which had been isolated earlier in the day, while trying to replace this it had resulted in some network latency and packet loss issues.  
  
This should now be back to full service.
updates.messageHtml:
We have been informed out a wavelength issue between Equinix MA1 (Manchester) and Continuity House (Coventry) which had been isolated earlier in the day, while trying to replace this it had resulted in some network latency and packet loss issues.

This should now be back to full service.

updates.message: We are currently investigating this incident.
updates.messageHtml: We are currently investigating this incident.
